info.name: Facebook-like Pokemon Showdown Skin
info.description: A facebook-like Pokemon Showdown style. If you have any question, you can find me at servers such as origin or big bang.
info.additionalInfo:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown.
